title: Immaculate Heart of Mary (Chapel of)
body: In 1918, a chapel of this invocation was begun at the site of Fajã do Penedo, in the parish of Boaventura, due to the initiative and strenuous efforts of D. Maria Margarida dos Anjos Ribeiro, who resides at the same site. It was solemnly blessed with great splendor on August 23, 1919, by the diocesan prelate D. António Manuel Pereira Ribeiro.

1918: Start of the construction of the chapel
